verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: held] [ARG1: a rally in Washington Township , Michigan] , [ARGM-TMP: while in the Washington , D.C. the correspondents ' dinner went on without him] .
President Donald Trump held a rally in Washington Township , Michigan , while [ARGM-LOC: in the Washington , D.C.] [ARG1: the correspondents ' dinner] [V: went] on [ARGM-MNR: without him] .
